SEARCH
Package Networking

Class NetworkUser

java.lang.Object
Networking.NetworkUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NetworkUser extends Object implements Serializable
A class that represents a client in the network. This class is used to store information such as the client's ID, name, and IP address. It also stores the TCP connection used to send data to the client.
Author:
Haotian
See Also:
